subject: Re: [R] Function to convert categorical variable in numerical
body:
Hi J. Andres,
You are probably better off using the ade4 package, which has two functionsthat will do exactly what you want, i.e. a PCA using mixed quantitative andcategorical variables:
## You will need to download ade4 firstlibrary(ade4)?dudi.hillsmith?dudi.mix
Regards,Mark Difford.
